siteMetadata.title: Blog by Henry Lewis
siteMetadata.subtitle: Developer passionate about tooling + developer experience. Web Engineer @ Sprout Social.

frontmatter.description: In some ways we can think about engineering systems in the same way linguists think about natural languages. Both can become ingrown and complex over time. How might we relate what we know about how "simpler" natural languages are formed to engineering teams and systems?
frontmatter.title: Language and Engineering systems are ingrown
